url.description: The current page URL where the click should happen.

selector.description: The element to click. Can be a CSS selector (e.g., '#submit-btn', '.nav-link') or a text-based selector starting with 'text=' (e.g., 'text=Load More', 'text=Next Page'). Text selectors are case-insensitive.

expect_navigation.description: Set to true if the click is expected to load a new page. Set to false if it triggers an in-page action (like opening a modal or loading more content).
